counterName.description: Name of the counter block to get match count information.

type.description: Type of actions that can be performed.

AccessControlListMatchCondition.description: Defines the match condition that is supported to filter the traffic.

dscpMarkings.description: List of DSCP Markings that need to be matched.

etherTypes.description: List of ether type values that need to be matched.

fragments.description: List of IP fragment packets that need to be matched.

ipCondition.description: IP condition that needs to be matched.

ipLengths.description: List of IP Lengths that need to be matched.

portCondition.description: Defines the port condition that needs to be matched.

protocolTypes.description: List of the protocols that need to be matched.

ttlValues.description: List of TTL [Time To Live] values that need to be matched.

vlanMatchCondition.description: Vlan match condition that needs to be matched.

AccessControlListMatchConfiguration.description: Defines the match configuration that are supported to filter the traffic.

actions.description: List of actions that need to be performed for the matched conditions.

ipAddressType.description: Type of IP Address. IPv4 or IPv6

matchConfigurationName.description: The name of the match configuration.

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence Number of the match configuration.

AccessControlListPortCondition.description: Defines the port condition that needs to be matched.

flags.description: List of protocol flags that need to be matched. Example: established | initial | <List-of-TCP-flags>. List of eligible TCP Flags are ack, fin, not-ack, not-fin, not-psh, not-rst, not-syn, not-urg, psh, rst, syn, urg

layer4Protocol.description: Layer4 protocol type that needs to be matched.

portGroupNames.description: List of the port Group Names that need to be matched.

portType.description: Port type that needs to be matched.

ports.description: List of the Ports that need to be matched.

AccessControlListProperties.description: Access Control List Properties defines the resource properties.

configurationType.description: Input method to configure Access Control List.

defaultAction.description: Default action that needs to be applied when no condition is matched. Example: Permit | Deny.

add.description: List of IP Extended Community IDs.

delete.description: List of IP Extended Community IDs.

set.description: List of IP Extended Community IDs.

prefix.description: IPv4 Prefix of the aggregate Ipv4Route.

AggregateRouteConfiguration.description: List of IPv4 and IPv6 aggregate routes.

multiplier.description: Multiplier for the Bfd Configuration. Example: 5.

exportRoutePolicy.description: Array of ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicies.

exportRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Route Policy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

ExportRoutePolicy.description: Export Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

ExpressRouteConnectionInformation.description: The ExpressRoute circuit ID and the Auth Key are required for you to successfully deploy NFC service.

expressRouteAuthorizationKey.description: Authorization key for the circuit, must be of type Microsoft.Network/expressRouteCircuits/authorizations. The Auth Key is a mandatory attribute.

expressRouteCircuitId.description: The express route circuit Azure resource ID, must be of type Microsoft.Network/expressRouteCircuits/circuitName. The ExpressRoute Circuit is a mandatory attribute.

exportRoutePolicy.description: Export Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

exportRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

importRoutePolicy.description: Import Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

importRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

networkToNetworkInterconnectId.description: ARM Resource ID of the networkToNetworkInterconnectId of the ExternalNetwork resource.

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

ingressAclId.description: Ingress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

mtu.description: MTU to use for option A peering.

ImportRoutePolicy.description: Import Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

InternalNetworkProperties.description: Internal Network Properties defines the properties of the resource.

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

exportRoutePolicy.description: Export Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

exportRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

importRoutePolicy.description: Import Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

importRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

ingressAclId.description: Ingress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

isMonitoringEnabled.description: To check whether monitoring of internal network is enabled or not.

mtu.description: Maximum transmission unit. Default value is 1500.

allowAS.description: Allows for routes to be received and processed even if the router detects its own ASN in the AS-Path. 0 is disable, Possible values are 1-10, default is 2.

ipv4ListenRangePrefixes.description: List of BGP IPv4 Listen Range prefixes.

ipv4NeighborAddress.description: List with stringified IPv4 Neighbor Addresses.

ipv6ListenRangePrefixes.description: List of BGP IPv6 Listen Ranges prefixes.

ipv6NeighborAddress.description: List with stringified IPv6 Neighbor Address.

InternetGatewayProperties.description: Internet Gateway Properties defines the properties of the resource.

internetGatewayRuleId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Internet Gateway Rule.

networkFabricControllerId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Network Fabric Controller.

InternetGatewayRuleProperties.description: Internet Gateway Rule Properties defines the resource properties.

ipCommunityIds.description: List of IP Community resource IDs.

IpCommunityProperties.description: IP Community Properties defines the resource properties.

action.description: Action to be taken on the configuration. Example: Permit | Deny.

communityMembers.description: List the community members of IP Community.

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence to insert to/delete from existing route. Prefix lists are evaluated starting with the lowest sequence number and continue down the list until a match is made. Once a match is made, the permit or deny statement is applied to that network and the rest of the list is ignored.

IpExtendedCommunityIdList.description: IP Extended Community Id list properties.

ipExtendedCommunityIds.description: List of IP Extended Community resource IDs.

IpExtendedCommunityProperties.description: IP Extended Community Properties defines the resource properties.

ipExtendedCommunityRules.description: List of IP Extended Community Rules.

IpExtendedCommunityRule.description: List of IP Extended Community Rules.

action.description: Action to be taken on the configuration. Example: Permit | Deny.

routeTargets.description: Route Target List.The expected formats are ASN(plain):NN >> example 4294967294:50, ASN.ASN:NN >> example 65533.65333:40, IP-address:NN >> example 10.10.10.10:65535. The possible values of ASN,NN are in range of 0-65535, ASN(plain) is in range of 0-4294967295.

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence to insert to/delete from existing route. Prefix lists are evaluated starting with the lowest sequence number and continue down the list until a match is made. Once a match is made, the permit or deny statement is applied to that network and the rest of the list is ignored.

IpMatchCondition.description: Defines the condition that can be filtered using the selected IPs.

ipGroupNames.description: The List of IP Group Names that need to be matched.

ipPrefixValues.description: The list of IP Prefixes that need to be matched.

prefixType.description: IP Prefix Type that needs to be matched.

type.description: IP Address type that needs to be matched.

IpPrefixProperties.description: IP Prefix Properties defines the properties of the resource.

ipPrefixRules.description: The list of IP Prefix Rules.

action.description: Action to be taken on the configuration. Example: Permit | Deny.

networkPrefix.description: Network Prefix specifying IPv4/IPv6 packets to be permitted or denied. Example: 1.1.1.0/24 | 3FFE:FFFF:0:CD30::/126

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence to insert to/delete from existing route. Prefix lists are evaluated starting with the lowest sequence number and continue down the list until a match is made. Once a match is made, the permit or deny statement is applied to that network and the rest of the list is ignored.

subnetMaskLength.description: SubnetMaskLength gives the minimum NetworkPrefix length to be matched. Possible values for IPv4 are 1 - 32 . Possible values of IPv6 are 1 - 128.

L2IsolationDomainProperties.description: L2Isolation Domain Properties defines the properties of the resource.

mtu.description: Maximum transmission unit. Default value is 1500.

networkFabricId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Network Fabric.

vlanId.description: Vlan Identifier of the Network Fabric. Example: 501.

L3ExportRoutePolicy.description: Array of ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicies.

exportIpv4RoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy.

exportIpv6RoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy.

L3IsolationDomainProperties.description: L3 Isolation Domain Properties defines the properties of the resource.

networkFabricId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Network Fabric.

exportRouteTargets.description: RouteTargets to be applied. This is used for the backward compatibility.

importRouteTargets.description: RouteTargets to be applied. This is used for the backward compatibility.

interfaces.description: List of network device interfaces resource IDs.

mtu.description: MTU of the packets between PE & CE.

name.description: The NFC service will be hosted in a Managed resource group.

ManagementNetworkConfigurationProperties.description: Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

NeighborGroupDestination.description: An array of destination IPv4 Addresses or IPv6 Addresses.

NeighborGroupProperties.description: Neighbor Group Properties defines the properties of the resource.

destination.description: An array of destination IPv4 Addresses or IPv6 Addresses.

NetworkDeviceProperties.description: Network Device Properties defines the properties of the resource.

hostName.description: The host name of the device.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the device. Format of serial Number - Make;Model;HardwareRevisionId;SerialNumber.

infrastructureExpressRouteConnections.description: As part of an update, the Infrastructure ExpressRoute CircuitID should be provided to create and Provision a NFC. This Express route is dedicated for Infrastructure services. (This is a Mandatory attribute)

ipv4AddressSpace.description: IPv4 Network Fabric Controller Address Space.

ipv6AddressSpace.description: IPv6 Network Fabric Controller Address Space.

isWorkloadManagementNetworkEnabled.description: A workload management network is required for all the tenant (workload) traffic. This traffic is only dedicated for Tenant workloads which are required to access internet or any other MSFT/Public endpoints.

workloadExpressRouteConnections.description: As part of an update, the workload ExpressRoute CircuitID should be provided to create and Provision a NFC. This Express route is dedicated for Workload services. (This is a Mandatory attribute).

NetworkFabricProperties.description: Network Fabric Properties defines the properties of the resource.

fabricASN.description: ASN of CE devices for CE/PE connectivity.

managementNetworkConfiguration.description: Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

networkFabricControllerId.description: Azure resource ID for the NetworkFabricController the NetworkFabric belongs.

networkFabricSku.description: Supported Network Fabric SKU.Example: Compute / Aggregate racks. Once the user chooses a particular SKU, only supported racks can be added to the Network Fabric. The SKU determines whether it is a single / multi rack Network Fabric.

rackCount.description: Number of compute racks associated to Network Fabric.

serverCountPerRack.description: Number of servers.Possible values are from 1-16.

terminalServerConfiguration.description: Network and credentials configuration currently applied to terminal server.

NetworkInterfaceProperties.description: Network Interface Properties defines the properties of the resource.

NetworkPacketBrokerProperties.description: Network Packet Broker Properties defines the properties of the resource.

networkFabricId.description: ARM resource ID of the Network Fabric.

networkFabricId.description: ARM resource ID of the Network Fabric.

destinations.description: List of destinations to send the filter traffic.

networkPacketBrokerId.description: ARM resource ID of the Network Packet Broker.

destinationId.description: The destination Id. ARM Resource ID of either NNI or Internal Networks.

destinationTapRuleId.description: ARM Resource ID of destination Tap Rule that contains match configurations.

destinationType.description: Type of destination. Input can be IsolationDomain or Direct.

destinationId.description: Destination Id. The ARM resource Id may be either Network To Network Interconnect or NeighborGroup.

isTimestampEnabled.description: The parameter to enable or disable the timestamp.

matchConfigurationName.description: The name of the match configuration. This is used when Goto type is provided. If Goto type is selected and no match configuration name is provided. It goes to next configuration.

type.description: Type of actions that can be performed.

NetworkTapRuleMatchCondition.description: Defines the match condition that is supported to filter the traffic.

encapsulationType.description: Encapsulation Type that needs to be matched.

protocolTypes.description: List of the protocols that need to be matched.

actions.description: List of actions that need to be performed for the matched conditions.

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence Number of the match configuration..

configurationType.description: Input method to configure Network Tap Rule.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnectProperties.description: Configuration used to setup CE-PE connectivity.

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

ingressAclId.description: Ingress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

isManagementType.description: Configuration to use NNI for Infrastructure Management. Example: True/False.

nniType.description: Type of NNI used. Example: CE | NPB

useOptionB.description: Based on this option layer3 parameters are mandatory. Example: True/False

peerASN.description: ASN of PE devices for CE/PE connectivity.Example : 28

OptionBProperties.description: Option B configuration to be used for Management VPN.

exportRouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes from CE. This is for backward compatibility.

importRouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes into CE. This is for backward compatibility.

layer4Protocol.description: Layer4 protocol type that needs to be matched.

name.description: The name of the port group.

addressFamilyType.description: AddressFamilyType. This parameter decides whether the given ipv4 or ipv6 route policy.

defaultAction.description: Default action that needs to be applied when no condition is matched. Example: Permit | Deny.

networkFabricId.description: Arm Resource ID of Network Fabric.

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence to insert to/delete from existing route.

exportIpv4RouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes into CE.

importIpv4RouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes into CE.

importIpv6RouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes from CE.

addressList.description: List of Addresses to be allowed or denied.

actionType.description: Action type. Example: Permit | Deny | Continue.

localPreference.description: Local Preference of the route policy.

ipExtendedCommunityIds.description: List of IP Extended Community resource IDs.

password.description: Password for the terminal server connection.

username.description: Username for the terminal server connection.

innerVlans.description: List of inner vlans that need to be matched.

vlanGroupNames.description: List of vlan group names that need to be matched.

vlans.description: List of vlans that need to be matched.
